schema.description: Request to configure an application as semi-manual.

is_semi_manual.description: Whether the application requires manual provisioning.

requires_approval_before_ticket.description:
Whether approval must complete before ticket creation.
When true, tickets are only created after access request approval completes.

sla_policy_id.description: Default SLA policy for this application.

ticketing_config_id.description: Default ticketing configuration for this application.

schema.title: ConfigureSemiManualRequest
